publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3603 Tommy Sheridan: Strike Action by Staff at North Glasgow NHS Trust-That the Parliament supports the clerical and ancillary staff at North Glasgow NHS Trust who are currently taking strike action; recognises that these workers have given up to 20 years' service to the NHS but are only earning an average of £11,000 per year and are badly in need of a wage rise, and calls on the trust to open serious negotiations with the employees with a view to securing a real improvement in their wages.
S1M-3603 Strike Action by Staff at North Glasgow NHS Trust (lodged on 19 November 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-3603 Tommy Sheridan: Strike Action by Staff at North Glasgow NHS Trust—That the Parliament supports the clerical and ancillary staff at North Glasgow NHS Trust who are currently taking strike action; recognises that these workers have given up to 20 years’ service to the NHS but are only earning an average of £11,000 per year and are badly in need of a wage rise, and calls on the trust to open serious negotiations with the employees with a view to securing a real improvement in their wages. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder
S1M-3603 Strike Action by Staff at North Glasgow NHS Trust (lodged on 19 November 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
